channel.title: [WIP] 07Tools - OSRS Tools & Fan Forum - Features - Snippets - Project Thread
channel.description:
[b]Note: This project is currently run by Ruby, Xephys(Jewls), and me.. We are looking for someone very good with Javascript (I'm still learning it fully.) to join development. [/b] [b]Preview:[/b] [url=http://07tools.com]07Tools - Oldschool RuneScape Fansite[/url] [b]Current Features (green) - Not Started (red) - In progress (orange)[/b] [u]Completed:[/u] Custom theme. Dynamic signatures. Tools page completed. [u]In-Progress:[/u] Calculators. Community establishment. [u]Not Started:[/u] Oldschool marketplace. EoC calculators. EoC dynamic sigs. NPC database. Item database. Quest database. Minigame database. [b]Update Log:[/b] [code] - Experience table added. - http://07tools.com/tools/xptable/ - Dynamic signature broken links fixed. - Started converting custom MyBB theme to a tabless/responsive style. [/code] [b]Notable Snippets:[/b] These are snippets from the site that I am proud of and wish to show off to the community. :) Tables forum display on MyBB, working on responsive design for this area. [code]
News Desk
 Site News & Updates
Threads: 4 Posts: 5
Signature Maker Added & D...
Yesterday by Lunacy
 OS & EOC RuneScape News
Threads: 0 Posts: 0
Never
 Feedback, Suggestion, & Bug Reports
Threads: 1 Posts: 4
Well then._.
Yesterday by Lunacy
[/code]

item.title: [WIP] 07Tools - OSRS Tools & Fan Forum - Features - Snippets - Project Thread
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

The Web Guy:

I’ve been wanting to make a community-based site like this and Zybez for a while now. I wish you luck, if you want some help with some of the PHP parts of the site, let me know.

I’m open to accepting new developers. Not too many though. I’ll shoot you a PM, if you can hang with the current devs then you will be able to assist us.

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] 07Tools - OSRS Tools & Fan Forum - Features - Snippets - Project Thread
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:16, topic:525097”]i dont deny that having support for eoc is wise in the matter of the site’s growth. however, if it’s 07tools the main focal point should be 07.

why not add a separate directory for eoc?

because when it comes to calculators, you’ll either need 2 separate ones, or a toggle in the calc itself, and itd be easier to go to /eoc/tools/ rather than that.

just my thoughts[/quote]

Once calculators come out they will indeed be separated into 2 different categories. Just like the signature maker for EoC will be totally separate from the old school one.

Read full topic
